items.name: 01- POST GRN Balance Check GRN Type 0

body.xml:
<ncts:CC015C PhaseID="NCTS5.0" xmlns:ncts="http://ncts.dgtaxud.ec">
    <messageSender>9999912345</messageSender>
    <messageRecipient>NTA.XI</messageRecipient>
    <preparationDateAndTime>{{preparationDateAndTime}}</preparationDateAndTime>
    <messageIdentification>{{messageIdentification}}</messageIdentification>
    <messageType>CC015C</messageType>
    <TransitOperation>
        <LRN>{{LRN}}</LRN>
        <declarationType>T1</declarationType>
        <additionalDeclarationType>A</additionalDeclarationType>
        <security>0</security>
        <reducedDatasetIndicator>0</reducedDatasetIndicator>
        <bindingItinerary>0</bindingItinerary>
        <limitDate>{{limitDate}}</limitDate>
    </TransitOperation>
    <Authorisation>
        <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
        <type>C521</type>
        <referenceNumber>XIACR24A1500661</referenceNumber>
    </Authorisation>
    <CustomsOfficeOfDeparture>
        <referenceNumber>XI000081</referenceNumber>
    </CustomsOfficeOfDeparture>
    <CustomsOfficeOfDestinationDeclared>
        <referenceNumber>GB000060</referenceNumber>
    </CustomsOfficeOfDestinationDeclared>
    <CustomsOfficeOfTransitDeclared>
        <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
        <referenceNumber>GB000060</referenceNumber>
        <arrivalDateAndTimeEstimated>{{arrivalTime}}</arrivalDateAndTimeEstimated>
    </CustomsOfficeOfTransitDeclared>
    <HolderOfTheTransitProcedure>
        <identificationNumber>XI673265407737</identificationNumber>
    </HolderOfTheTransitProcedure>
    <Guarantee>
        <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
        <guaranteeType>0</guaranteeType>
        <GuaranteeReference>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <GRN>23XI0000010000116</GRN>
            <accessCode>AC01</accessCode>
            <amountToBeCovered>10000.00</amountToBeCovered>
            <currency>GBP</currency>
        </GuaranteeReference>
    </Guarantee>
    <Guarantee>
        <sequenceNumber>2</sequenceNumber>
        <guaranteeType>1</guaranteeType>
        <GuaranteeReference>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <GRN>23XI0000010000210</GRN>
            <accessCode>AC01</accessCode>
            <amountToBeCovered>25000.00</amountToBeCovered>
            <currency>GBP</currency>
        </GuaranteeReference>
    </Guarantee>
    <Guarantee>
        <sequenceNumber>3</sequenceNumber>
        <guaranteeType>9</guaranteeType>
        <GuaranteeReference>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <GRN>23XI00000100001D4</GRN>
            <accessCode>AC01</accessCode>
            <amountToBeCovered>40000.00</amountToBeCovered>
            <currency>GBP</currency>
        </GuaranteeReference>
    </Guarantee>
    <Consignment>
        <countryOfDispatch>XI</countryOfDispatch>
        <countryOfDestination>GB</countryOfDestination>
        <containerIndicator>1</containerIndicator>
        <grossMass>1000.00</grossMass>
        <referenceNumberUCR>AB1234</referenceNumberUCR>
        <Consignor>
            <identificationNumber>XI673265407737</identificationNumber>
        </Consignor>
        <Consignee>
            <identificationNumber>GB954131533000</identificationNumber>
        </Consignee>
        <TransportEquipment>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <containerIdentificationNumber>WGPCGR</containerIdentificationNumber>
            <numberOfSeals>1</numberOfSeals>
            <Seal>
                <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                <identifier>1234</identifier>
            </Seal>
        </TransportEquipment>
        <LocationOfGoods>
            <typeOfLocation>B</typeOfLocation>
            <qualifierOfIdentification>Y</qualifierOfIdentification>
            <authorisationNumber>XI DEP BT1 3ET</authorisationNumber>
        </LocationOfGoods>
        <DepartureTransportMeans>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <typeOfIdentification>30</typeOfIdentification>
            <identificationNumber>NC15REG</identificationNumber>
            <nationality>XI</nationality>
        </DepartureTransportMeans>
        <PlaceOfLoading>
            <country>XI</country>
            <location>Belfast</location>
        </PlaceOfLoading>
        <HouseConsignment>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <grossMass>1000.00</grossMass>
            <ConsignmentItem>
                <goodsItemNumber>1</goodsItemNumber>
                <declarationGoodsItemNumber>1</declarationGoodsItemNumber>
                <Commodity>
                    <descriptionOfGoods>Pharmaceuticals</descriptionOfGoods>
                    <CommodityCode>
                        <harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>392690</harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>
                    </CommodityCode>
                    <GoodsMeasure>
                        <grossMass>1000.00</grossMass>
                        <netMass>950.00</netMass>
                    </GoodsMeasure>
                </Commodity>
                <Packaging>
                    <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                    <typeOfPackages>BX</typeOfPackages>
                    <numberOfPackages>1</numberOfPackages>
                    <shippingMarks>Pharmaceuticals to be shipped</shippingMarks>
                </Packaging>
            </ConsignmentItem>
        </HouseConsignment>
    </Consignment>
</ncts:CC015C>

    </HolderOfTheTransitProcedure>
    <Guarantee>
        <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
        <guaranteeType>1</guaranteeType>
        <GuaranteeReference>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <GRN>23XI0000010000152</GRN>
            <accessCode>AC01</accessCode>
            <amountToBeCovered>100.00</amountToBeCovered>
            <currency>GBP</currency>
        </GuaranteeReference>
    </Guarantee>
    <Consignment>
        <countryOfDispatch>XI</countryOfDispatch>
        <countryOfDestination>GB</countryOfDestination>
        <containerIndicator>1</containerIndicator>
        <!-- <inlandModeOfTransport>4</inlandModeOfTransport>
        <modeOfTransportAtTheBorder>1</modeOfTransportAtTheBorder> -->
        <grossMass>1000.00</grossMass>
        <referenceNumberUCR>AB1234</referenceNumberUCR>
        <Consignor>
            <identificationNumber>XI673265407741</identificationNumber>
        </Consignor>
        <Consignee>
            <identificationNumber>GB954131533000</identificationNumber>
        </Consignee>
        <TransportEquipment>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <containerIdentificationNumber>WGPCGR</containerIdentificationNumber>
            <numberOfSeals>1</numberOfSeals>
            <Seal>
                <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                <identifier>1234</identifier>
            </Seal>
            <GoodsReference>
                <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                <declarationGoodsItemNumber>1</declarationGoodsItemNumber>
            </GoodsReference>
        </TransportEquipment>
        <LocationOfGoods>
            <typeOfLocation>B</typeOfLocation>
            <qualifierOfIdentification>Y</qualifierOfIdentification>
            <authorisationNumber>XIDEPBT13ET</authorisationNumber>
        </LocationOfGoods>
        <DepartureTransportMeans>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <typeOfIdentification>40</typeOfIdentification>
            <identificationNumber>NC15REG</identificationNumber>
            <nationality>XI</nationality>
        </DepartureTransportMeans>
        <PlaceOfLoading>
            <UNLocode>ADENC</UNLocode>
            <country>XI</country>
            <location>Belfast</location>
        </PlaceOfLoading>
        <HouseConsignment>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <!-- <countryOfDestination>GB</countryOfDestination> -->
            <grossMass>1000.00</grossMass>
            <ConsignmentItem>
                <goodsItemNumber>1</goodsItemNumber>
                <declarationGoodsItemNumber>1</declarationGoodsItemNumber>
                <Commodity>
                    <descriptionOfGoods>Radioactive Spiders</descriptionOfGoods>
                    <CommodityCode>
                        <harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>392690</harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>
                    </CommodityCode>
                    <GoodsMeasure>
                        <grossMass>1000.000</grossMass>
                        <netMass>950.000</netMass>
                    </GoodsMeasure>
                </Commodity>
                <Packaging>
                    <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                    <typeOfPackages>BX</typeOfPackages>
                    <numberOfPackages>1</numberOfPackages>
                    <shippingMarks>XI Box goods to be shipped</shippingMarks>

                    </CommodityCode>
                    <GoodsMeasure>
                        <grossMass>1000.00</grossMass>
                        <netMass>950.00</netMass>
                    </GoodsMeasure>
                </Commodity>
                <Packaging>
                    <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                    <typeOfPackages>BX</typeOfPackages>
                    <numberOfPackages>1</numberOfPackages>
                    <shippingMarks>Pharmaceuticals to be shipped</shippingMarks>
                </Packaging>
            </ConsignmentItem>
        </HouseConsignment>
    </Consignment>
</ncts:CC015C>

body.xml:
<ncts:CC015C PhaseID="NCTS5.0" xmlns:ncts="http://ncts.dgtaxud.ec">
    <messageSender>9999912345</messageSender>
    <messageRecipient>NTA.XI</messageRecipient>

    <messageType>CC015C</messageType>

        <LRN>{{LRN}}</LRN>
        <declarationType>T1</declarationType>

    <HolderOfTheTransitProcedure>

    </HolderOfTheTransitProcedure>
    <Guarantee>

            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>

    </Guarantee>
    <Guarantee>
        <sequenceNumber>2</sequenceNumber>
        <guaranteeType>1</guaranteeType>

    </Guarantee>
    <Guarantee>

            <currency>GBP</currency>
        </GuaranteeReference>
    </Guarantee>

        </Consignor>

        </Consignee>

        </LocationOfGoods>
        <DepartureTransportMeans>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <typeOfIdentification>30</typeOfIdentification>
            <identificationNumber>NC15REG</identificationNumber>
            <nationality>XI</nationality>
        </DepartureTransportMeans>
        <!--<PlaceOfLoading>
            <country>XI</country>
            <location>Belfast</location>
        </PlaceOfLoading>-->
        <HouseConsignment>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <grossMass>1000.00</grossMass>
